mapper.insert: insert into ent_item_info_log ( id, pripid, maintbid, regino, altDate, msg, itemcode, logDetail ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pripid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regino, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logDetail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
